head.title: World Briefing | Asia: India: Prime Minister To Stay

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Government, Philanthropy and NGO

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Asia: India: Prime Minister To Stay

abstract.p: India's prime minister, Atal Behari Vajpayee, withdraws threat to resign after members of his ruling coalition rally behind him and issue statement of 'unqualified' faith and trust in his leadership; photo (S)

block.p: The country's prime minister, Atal Behari Vajpayee, withdrew his threat to resign after members of his ruling coalition rallied behind him and issued a statement of ''unqualified faith and trust'' in his leadership. Support for Mr. Vajpayee was renewed after he expressed exasperation with political sniping from his allies.

The country's prime minister, Atal Behari Vajpayee, withdrew his threat to resign after members of his ruling coalition rallied behind him and issued a statement of ''unqualified faith and trust'' in his leadership. Support for Mr. Vajpayee was renewed after he expressed exasperation with political sniping from his allies.
